input.sentences: the ceremony began with a wife pinning her husband for his accomplishment .
he could n't help but feel proud as he received his promotion .
another fellow service member received her reward .
people of all backgrounds and rank were awarded that day .
it was a wonderful day filled with honorable people being recognized for their accomplishments .
output.sentences: The wife was pinning the medal on her husband.
The husband was proud to have received a promotion.
A reward for her service, a woman received an award.
It's not every day people move up in rank.
The wonderful service people stand recognized as heroes.
